data.text:
@LindseyGrahamSC @POTUS Dear Mr. Graham,  

Thank you for supporting the Iranian people. Please urge President Trump @POTUS to end negotiations with the regime. Its record of hatred and instability shows it cannot be trusted. Stand with the people of Iran, not their oppressors.
@LindseyGrahamSC @POTUS You are the most pathetic piece of garbage in the human race!
@LindseyGrahamSC @POTUS You have to be blind to not see the bird even in bird couldn't escape from the reign of bullets into Iran https://t.co/x8du9mhM6z

@LindseyGrahamSC @POTUS If you don’t destroy Khamenei and his regime, they will fuck the world up. I know these killers very well.
@POTUS  🤍☀️🦁

@LindseyGrahamSC @POTUS The criminal Islamic Republic regime is a danger to the entire world and brings insecurity and war globally. Only with the overthrow of this regime will the world achieve peace.#KingRezaPahlavi
#RezaPahlaviForlran

@LindseyGrahamSC @POTUS We, the people of Iran, also demand the overthrow of the Ayatollahs’ regime. They are a foreign regime that massacred nearly forty thousand Iranians in just two days.#KingRezaPahlavi
#RezaPahlaviForlran
@LindseyGrahamSC @POTUS Please help us people of Iran need help please stop negotiating
